about.heading: About Ave Maria
about.story: Ave Maria was founded in 2015 with a vision to serve churches through media. What began as a small volunteer effort has grown into a dedicated team of professionals committed to helping churches communicate effectively.
about.mission: Our mission is to empower churches with professional media services, enabling them to share their message clearly and beautifully without the burden of high costs.

contact.heading: Contact Us
contact.description: Have a question or interested in our services? We'd love to hear from you.

faqs.question: Are your services really free?
faqs.answer: Yes! Thanks to our donors and volunteers, we provide our core services at no cost to qualifying churches.

faqs.question: How do we request your services?
faqs.answer: Simply fill out the contact form on this page, and we'll get back to you within 48 hours to discuss your needs.

faqs.question: How far in advance should we book your services?
faqs.answer: We recommend contacting us at least 4-6 weeks before your project deadline to ensure availability.
